text.section:
A bondholder, a holder of any coupons attached to bonds, or a trustee under a trust agreement securing the bonds may sue:
To protect and enforce rights under laws of the State or a trust agreement; and
To enforce and compel the performance of duties by an authority or its officer, employee, or agent that this subtitle or a trust agreement requires, including fixing and collecting rates, rents, fees, and charges that the trust agreement requires to be fixed and collected.
The rights under this section are subject to any trust agreement.
